analysis.description:
LescoinPreSale.fallback (/unique_chucks/13/0x6a57883b5748bf3631ac2e0d43bf0d6f6cbcd16b.sol#385-395) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-tokenReward.transfer(msg.sender,tokenAmount * (100 + bonus) / 100) (/unique_chucks/13/0x6a57883b5748bf3631ac2e0d43bf0d6f6cbcd16b.sol#394-395)

LescoinPreSale.WithdrawTokens (/unique_chucks/13/0x6a57883b5748bf3631ac2e0d43bf0d6f6cbcd16b.sol#400-406) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-tokenReward.transfer(coldWallet,_amount) (/unique_chucks/13/0x6a57883b5748bf3631ac2e0d43bf0d6f6cbcd16b.sol#405-406)

LescoinPreSale.TransferTokens (/unique_chucks/13/0x6a57883b5748bf3631ac2e0d43bf0d6f6cbcd16b.sol#407-408) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-tokenReward.transfer(_to,_amount) (/unique_chucks/13/0x6a57883b5748bf3631ac2e0d43bf0d6f6cbcd16b.sol)
